details.About: Driving School Instructors teach students motor vehicle operation, road rules and safe driving practices.

Instructor/Trainner.Education Level: High school diploma or its GED equivalent
Instructor/Trainner.Licensure: Valid state driver's license and state driving instructor license required
Instructor/Trainner.Experience: 2-5 years of driving experience may be necessary for instructor licensure

details.Scope of Work: Vehicle Driving, Training vehicles, Smart Classes, Service Training Center

Vehicle Required: HGV (Heavy goods vehicle) BUS AND TRUCK
Infrastructure Requirement.Driving Training Simulator: CV-DTS Delivers a fully customizable training experience with reconfigurable cabs & incorporating actual vehicle controls, gauges, switches, etc.

details.Eligibility Criteria: Eligible candidates should have a valid driving license and possess a minimum of two years of experience in the driving field.
details.Exam Format: The exam will be conducted in multiple cities across India, with a duration of 2 hours. The exam format will include both theoretical and practical questions.
details.Examination Venue: Examinations will be held at designated centers across the country.
